00045 // ProjectionLight Method Definitions
00046 ProjectionLight::
00047         ProjectionLight(const Transform &light2world,
00048                 const Spectrum &intensity, const string &texname,
00049                 float fov)
00050         : Light(light2world) {
00051         lightPos = LightToWorld(Point(0,0,0));
00052         Intensity = intensity;
00053         // Create _ProjectionLight_ MIP-map
00054         int width, height;
00055         Spectrum *texels = ReadImage(texname, &width, &height);
00056         if (texels)
00057                 projectionMap =
00058                         new MIPMap<Spectrum>(width, height, texels);
00059         else
00060                 projectionMap = NULL;
00061         delete[] texels;
00062         // Initialize _ProjectionLight_ projection matrix
00063         float aspect = float(width) / float(height);
00064         if (aspect > 1.f)  {
00065                 screenX0 = -aspect;  screenX1 =  aspect;
00066                 screenY0 = -1.f;     screenY1 =  1.f;
00067         }
00068         else {
00069                 screenX0 = -1.f;            screenX1 =  1.f;
00070                 screenY0 = -1.f / aspect;   screenY1 =  1.f / aspect;
00071         }
00072         hither = RAY_EPSILON;
00073         yon = 1e30f;
00074         lightProjection = Perspective(fov, hither, yon);
00075         // Compute cosine of cone surrounding projection directions
00076         float opposite = tanf(Radians(fov) / 2.f);
00077         float tanDiag = opposite * sqrtf(1.f + 1.f/(aspect*aspect));
00078         cosTotalWidth = cosf(atanf(tanDiag));
00079 }
00080 ProjectionLight::~ProjectionLight() { delete projectionMap; }
00081 Spectrum ProjectionLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi,
00082                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00083         *wi = Normalize(lightPos - p);
00084         visibility->SetSegment(p, lightPos);
00085         return Intensity * Projection(-*wi) /
00086                 DistanceSquared(lightPos, p);
00087 }
00088 Spectrum ProjectionLight::Projection(const Vector &w) const {
00089         Vector wl = WorldToLight(w);
00090         // Discard directions behind projection light
00091         if (wl.z < hither) return 0.;
00092         // Project point on to projection plane and compute light
00093         Point Pl = lightProjection(Point(wl.x, wl.y, wl.z));
00094         if (Pl.x < screenX0 || Pl.x > screenX1 ||
00095                 Pl.y < screenY0 || Pl.y > screenY1) return 0.;
00096         if (!projectionMap) return 1;
00097         float s = (Pl.x - screenX0) / (screenX1 - screenX0);
00098         float t = (Pl.y - screenY0) / (screenY1 - screenY0);
00099         return projectionMap->Lookup(s, t);
00100 }
00101 Spectrum ProjectionLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, float u1, float u2,
00102                 Vector *wi, float *pdf,
00103                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00104         *wi = Normalize(lightPos - p);
00105         *pdf = 1.f;
00106         visibility->SetSegment(p, lightPos);
00107         return Intensity * Projection(-*wi) / DistanceSquared(lightPos, p);
00108 }
00109 Spectrum ProjectionLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00110                 float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00111         ray->o = lightPos;
00112         Vector v = UniformSampleCone(u1, u2, cosTotalWidth);
00113         ray->d = LightToWorld(v);
00114         *pdf = UniformConePdf(cosTotalWidth);
00115         return Intensity * Projection(ray->d);
00116 }
